Master Xonia:
Welcome, Kamael.
I am Xonia. I wish to teach you about the classes available to our kind.
*Kamael Soldiers* are powerful with both spell and sword, and attack with great speed. They use their opponent`s souls to unleash their most powerful skills!
As your strength grows, you`ll notice a *Skill* *Window automatically popping up* from time to time. You can also use the shortcut key *ALT+K* to check out the list of skills you already know of.
